name: QWERTY (rumis, Eduardo Bellon, phansonloc1999)
description:
A small rhythm game made in 72 hours for LÖVE Jam 2020. The theme was "frequency".

Made with LOVE 11.1

Controls

 "QWERTY" : 

  • Like the name suggests, press your 'Q', 'W', 'E', 'R', 'T' or 'Y' at the right time to clear the note
  • The more precisely you press, the more points you earn
Credits
  • Phan Son Loc - Code
  • Eduardo Bellon - Audio
  • Rumis - Art
Notes

This game is far from perfect. We will be more than happy if you point out out flaws and help us learn from our mistakes. Please drop a comment and give us your feedback, we will be glad to listen to what you have to say. ( PS: You can start by rating our game from a scale of 0 to 10 ! )
